title: Notes Found in Bottles
author: Deborah Wing
html:
Notes Found in Bottles

Deborah Wing

Location of (plural) find: The Ducking Pond, Salem Inscription(s): “It was all because my wife didn't understand me...

—Reverend Dimmesdale”

“All for love and the world well lost....

—Hester”

“Phooey!

—Pearl”
